contentrichtext.text: {{MedalTableTop}} {{MedalSport | Men’s [[Boxing]]}} {{MedalCountry | {{FRG}} }} {{MedalCompetition|[[Boxing at the Summer Olympics|Olympic Games]]}} {{MedalBronze| [[1972 Summer Olympics|1972 Munich]] | [[Boxing at the 1972 Summer Olympics|Heavyweight]]}} {{MedalCompetition|[[World Amateur Boxing Championships|World Amateur Championships]]}} {{MedalBronze| [[1982 World Amateur Boxing Championships|1982 Munich]] | Super Heavyweight}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Peter Hussing''' (15 May 1948 – 8 September 2012) was a [[West Germany|West German]] heavyweight [[boxing]] champion. He was born in [[Brachbach]], [[Sieg]]. Although one of the favorites in European Championship in [[Katowice]] in 1975, he was KO-ed by [[Andrzej Biegalski]] from [[Poland]], who later became the champion. In 1979 in [[Cologne]] Hussing became the European Champion . He also represented West Germany at the [[1984 Summer Olympics]] in [[Los Angeles, California]], where he was eliminated in the quarterfinals at the hands of [[Albanians|Albanian]] boxer [[Aziz Salihu]] from [[Yugoslavia]]. ==References== *[http://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/athletes/hu/peter-hussing-1.html Peter Hussing's profile at Sports Reference.com] *[http://www.swr.de/nachrichten/rp/-/id=1682/nid=1682/did=10296426/1lmsknd/index.html Peter Hussing's obituary] {{de icon}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Hussing, Peter | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Boxer | DATE OF BIRTH = 15 May 1948 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 8 September 2012 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hussing, Peter}} [[Category:1948 births]] [[Category:2012 deaths]] [[Category:German boxers]] [[Category:Olympic boxers of West Germany]] [[Category:Heavyweight boxers]] [[Category:Boxers at the 1972 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Boxers at the 1976 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Boxers at the 1984 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic bronze medalists for West Germany]] [[Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in boxing]] {{Germany-boxing-bio-stub}} {{Germany-Olympic-medalist-stub}}
